name: Mx. Aria Stewart (@aredridel@kolektiva.social)
summary:
https://sauropods.win/@futurebird/111035301809333340

I don't think people realize just how much 'marketing gender' shapes our commercial world.

This is the stuff of Gender: "Men" "Women" "Kids"

This is why when you get the gender bit set as you browse the web without an ad blocker, ALL your ads change.

Want to avoid cryptocurrency ads? Look up wedding stuff before visiting anything related to software development.

Not to say you won't get even more horrifying things, but you will be coded as 'women'.

Oh wait, I'm hearing _men get married too?_ that can't be right. Only women look at wedding things.
